item.title: Examples of Github Hosted Sites
item.description: Table of Contents 1. Github natively displays Markdown and similar text formats 2. It’s great for low maintenance content 3. You can publish interactive content Takeaways Earlier, I wrote a piece on how to quickly publish a site to surge.sh and keep 100% control over your content. In it, I also mentioned that you can publish to Github using their Github pages feature. I’m writing a separate post on this because I want to show how powerful a publishing tool it is.
